abstract: Facebook is busy squaring away all necessary filings in anticipation of its stock market debut, widely expected to take place in May.
snippet: Facebook is busy squaring away all necessary filings in anticipation of its stock market debut, widely expected to take place in May.
lead_paragraph: Facebook’s chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, is rushing to clear all his paperwork ahead of the social network’s highly anticipated initial public offering.

headline.main: Ahead of I.P.O., Mark Zuckerberg’s Lawyers Expedite Disclosures
